HomePage.title: Welcome to Luxury
HomePage.dp: Nestled in Dubai’s historic district, Golden Sands Hotel Creek blends the charm of the city’s rich past with modern sophistication. This distinguished hotel offers an experience of luxury and innovation, surrounded by the vibrancy of Dubai’s cultural heart.
HomePage.pchoose: Choose from 150 luxurious Suites & Rooms, Golden Sands Creek provides an ideal base to take in a unique perspective of Dubai’s most historic quarter.
